resources: I Remember When… Enter Game Code Create Room Join Room Enter Your Name Here Ready Share this 4 digit code with your friends. When all have joined hit the ready button Enter the Game Code that you have been given: Rules Players in Game Game Rules Overview This is a conversation-based game that prompts players to tell stories, which the other players must determine whether it is true or not Each turn one player will be the storyteller, the others will be listeners Objective How to Win Either the first person to 500 points or the person with the highest score after 10 rounds will be declared the winner Close Rules Storyteller Listener Tell your story. If you make your story up then you must defend your story to trick your fellow players into believing that it truly happened. Players believe your lie? Safely tell a true story? No one believes your lie? (per listener convinced) Listen to the story and try to figure out whether the Storyteller is telling a real story from personal experience, or are making it up. You will have the chance after they tell their story to question them, and guess if its true or not. Guess correctly? Get duped by a fake story? Falsely accuse a player of lying or fail to guess in time? Points + 20 + 10 - 20 - 10 -5 Defend Your Story Question the Storyteller You are a Listener! Listen to the story. Does it sound like a true story, or is it made up? You can grill the storyteller about it in the next stage. Do you think that was a real story? Yes, its a true story No, its made up Time Left: You are the Storyteller! Storyteller prompt displayed here Do you want to tell a true story or make something up? Tell the truth Make it up Tell my story Get 30 more seconds Story is Done Defend your story to the listeners Skip storyteller was: Scoreboard WINNER FOUND!! Retry Next Round Background Image New Prompt Quit Game image from istockphoto.com, see full html address in strings.xml //https://www.istockphoto.com/vector/seamless–pattern–with–flat-style-board-game-attributes-on-white-background-gm1147962418-309855856 Incoming Meeting Invitation Sending Meeting Invitation 4 digit number
